info.name: mDrifus - Firefox Aero Glass Project
info.description:
mDrifus - Firefox aero glass project - modded by Rist
Original autor - Drifus - http://userstyles.org/users/62017 .
Tested on Firefox 36.0.3

!!Only works with Classic Theme Restorer : https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/classicthemerestorer/?src=userprofile

!!My CTR settings : http://pastebin.com/ajq2Bxan (download go addons CTR options > settings > import pref. txt)

!!! if your all pages is in Aero(transparent) then select "About:blank aka new tab Aero" - "No" !! :)

placeholder picture : http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2012/039/6/a/aww_aero_firefox_by_estrist-d4p3cp0.png
